title: What is cross-platform mobile development?
desc: Cross-platform development allows us to create mobile apps that work on both iOS and Android using a single codebase. This approach saves time and costs while maintaining native performance and user experience.

title: How long does it take to develop a mobile app?
desc: Development time varies based on complexity. Simple apps take 2-3 months, while complex apps with advanced features can take 4-6 months. We provide detailed timelines during the planning phase.

title: Do you provide app store submission support?
desc: Yes, we handle the complete app store submission process for both Google Play Store and Apple App Store, including optimization, compliance checks, and addressing any review feedback.

title: What technologies do you use for development?
desc: We specialize in React Native and Flutter for cross-platform development. We also use modern backend technologies like Node.js, Firebase, and cloud services for complete solutions.

title: Do you provide ongoing maintenance and support?
desc: Absolutely! We offer comprehensive maintenance packages including bug fixes, performance optimization, security updates, and feature enhancements to keep your app running smoothly.

title: Can you integrate my existing systems with the mobile app?
desc: Yes, we can integrate your mobile app with existing APIs, databases, CRM systems, payment gateways, and third-party services to ensure seamless data flow and functionality.
